<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Header -->
# Core.Dashboard
> UI Aggregation Layer
<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Overview -->
## Overview

This module is responsible for loading the data required by the main application **Dashboard**.
It does not own data itself but aggregates Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) from other modules.

### Key Features
-   **KPI Counters**: Open Leads, Pending Jobs, Unpaid Invoices.
-   **Charts**: Data for dashboard visualizations.

<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->
